about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a full-stack software developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I enjoy solving complex problems and building applications that provide real value to users. With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend development, I can handle projects from concept to deployment.

jobs.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
